wikipedia_page.main: Sir John Michael Davies  (born 2 August 1940) is the former Clerk of the Parliaments of the United Kingdom.  He succeeded Sir Michael Wheeler-Booth on 4 January 1997 and retired on 14 July 2003 succeeded by Paul Hayter.  Sir Michael had overseen significant changes to the workings and Membership of the House of Lords related to the changes brought about by the passage of the House of Lords Act.

response: * Michael Davies (television producer) (born 1966), British producer of television game shows in the United States
